data.eml:eml: Colletteichthys flavipinnis, a new toadfish species from Sri Lanka and India (Teleostei: Batrachoididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Greenfield, David W. (2012): Colletteichthys flavipinnis, a new toadfish species from Sri Lanka and India (Teleostei: Batrachoididae). Zootaxa 3437: 24-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211147
